categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Davrill was a Human male who served in the rank of Lieutenant of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War.

Stationed on Balmorra, Davrill discovered that the old Balmorran government was sending generators to the Balmorran resistance in order to power the artillery. He tasked an Imperial spacer to locate the warehouse where these generators were being stored and destroy them.
